neuro winks: Neuro winks at any point during the stream, this does not include when she says "heart"
neuro says \"heart\": Neuro says "heart" at any point during the stream
neuro mentions vedal unprompted: Neuro mentions Vedal, unprompted by chat
neuro calls herself god/goddess: Neuro says that she's a god or goddess
neuro meows: Neuro meows at any point during the stream
neuro makes up a person: Neuro makes up a random person
